maml:description.maml:para: Gets the hardware information of the network adapter.

The **Get-NetAdapterHardwareInfo** cmdlet gets the hardware information of the network adapter. This includes PCI capabilities, MSI capabilities, and PCI device custom properties. These are read-only properties.
